DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: French Unemployment_Rate Declines to 12.6 % : The nation ' s jobless rate fell_in October by 17 # 700 people , the largest monthly decline in six years , for a seasonally adjusted annual rate of 12.6 % , the Labor Ministry said . The surprise drop , from 12.7 % in September , still leaves France atop the jobless rate of the Group of Seven industrialized countries , ahead of Italy , whose unemployment_rate is 11.9 % . But the decline , coming_after two consecutive months of rises , was a plus for the conservative government of Prime_Minister Edouard Balladur , which is anxious to show its job-creation policies are delivering the goods ahead of May ' s presidential elections .
